about.title: About Universal AI Mapper
about.subtitle: Learn how to make the most of this platform

what_is.title: What is Universal AI Mapper Core?
what_is.desc1: Universal AI Mapper Core is a comprehensive platform designed to help you discover, understand, and combine AI tools and technologies for your projects.
what_is.desc2: Whether you're a creator, developer, or learner, our platform provides intelligent recommendations, curated tool stacks, and detailed insights to help you build powerful AI-driven applications.

step1.title: Explore & Discover
step1.desc: Browse our extensive catalog of AI tools, filtered by purpose, difficulty, and application field.

step2.title: Learn & Understand
step2.desc: Access detailed descriptions, use cases, and integration guides for each tool.

step3.title: Build & Export
step3.desc: Create your custom tool stack and export configurations for your preferred platforms.

discovery.title: Smart Discovery
discovery.desc: Find the perfect tools using our advanced filtering and search capabilities

combinations.title: Tool Combinations
combinations.desc: Explore pre-built stacks and learn which tools work best together

insights.title: Detailed Insights
insights.desc: Access comprehensive guides, strategies, and creative applications for each tool

export.title: Multi-Format Export
export.desc: Export your selections to JSON, CSV, Notion, or custom AI prompts

use_cases.title: Who Is This For?
use_cases.case4: Learners exploring the AI tool ecosystem

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is this platform free to use?
faq.a1: Yes! Universal AI Mapper Core is completely free to use. You can browse, search, and export tool information without any cost.
faq.a2: Tools are categorized using our Universal AI Mapper framework, which includes dimensions like purpose, functional role, tech layer, data flow, difficulty, and application field.
faq.a3: Absolutely! We're constantly expanding our database. While we don't have a submission form yet, you can reach out through our community channels.
faq.q4: How often is the database updated?
faq.a4: We regularly update our database to include new tools, update existing information, and add new featured stacks based on community feedback and industry trends.

get_started.title: Ready to Get Started?
get_started.desc: Here's how to make the most of Universal AI Mapper:
get_started.step1: Start by exploring tools in your area of interest using filters
get_started.step2: Check out featured stacks for inspiration and best practices
get_started.step3: Export your selections and start building amazing projects
